Sentencas: La2-xYbxCe2O7 (where x = 0, 0.05, 0.10, 0.15, and 0.20) has been studied as a possible electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), demonstrating a novel material.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: Nanosized La2-xYbxCe2O7 ceramics have been synthesized via the glycine nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: To elucidate the dual phase character (F-type and C-type phase) present in the Yb-doped La2Ce2O7, extensive X-ray diffraction and Raman spectroscopy analyses have been performed to thoroughly investigate the crystal structure and phases.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: Furthermore, doping has been shown to affect the dual phases present in the system.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity and the space charge potential of the Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 have been analyzed in details and the highest ionic conductivity of 3.3 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C is achieved at x = 0.05.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: Therefore, the La1.95Yb0.05Ce2O7 composition has been chosen for the electrophoretic deposition (EPD) for SOFCs fabrication.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: The La1.95Yb0.05Ce2O7 film, coated using EPD in isopropanol, is found to be crack-free and dense with a thickness of approximately 14 mu m.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the fabricated cell is observed to be 589 and 420 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C in wet hydrogen and methane fuel, respectively.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs

Sentencas: Impedance spectrum analysis utilizing the distribution of relaxation time (DRT) analysis shows that the gas diffusion process in the electrodes plays a significant role in the overall polarization of the cell.
Titulo: Dual-phase Yb-doped La2Ce2O7 materials for fuel flexible SOFCs
